#id=1
#text=To go on a train ride to Chicago , I had to have a ticket .
#id=2
#text=It is possible to buy tickets online , but it was fun to go to the train station to get them .
#id=3
#text=At the train station , I got in line and waited my turn .
#id=4
#text=When I got to the window , I told the station agent where I wanted to go , when , and what kind of ticket I wanted .
#id=5
#text=She told me how much I had to pay .
#id=6
#text=You can pay with cash , but I paid by credit card .
#id=7
#text=It is a long trip , so I had to show my identification as well .
#id=8
#text=Since I was going in an hour , I waited for the train .
#id=9
#text=You can wait in the station , but I waited on the platform .
#text=The ticket will tell which platform you want .
#text=The train arrived at the platform in plenty of time for everyone to get on board .
#text=As I got on , I showed my ticket to the conductor , but kept it .
#text=Then I found myself a nice seat .
#text=Usually , young able-bodied people will take the upstairs seats , and leave the downstairs seats for people who want to sit down right away .
#text=Soon after I took my seat , I heard someone outside call , All aboard !
#text=There was a gentle chugging sound as the train slowly got underway .
#text=The conductor soon came and took my ticket , and fastened up a card with my destination by my seat .
#text=Now I was free to roam about the train , looking out the windows and watching the countryside fly by .
#text=Each stop was announced over the P.A. system well in advance , so I knew just when to get off the train .
#text=When I heard Chicago announced , I went downstairs to wait with the other people who were getting off there .
#text=We were all standing up , so we hung on tight .
#text=When the train doors opened , we stepped down carefully onto the platform in Chicago .
